item.title: Eight-year-old girl in Raichur critically injured in stray dog attack
item.description:
<![CDATA[Eight-year-old girl in Raichur critically injured in stray dog attack parents accuse panchayat officers of negligence
Vartha Bharati | 29-03-2025 | 16:56:00 IST
Representational Image | PC: PTI
Raichur: An eight-year-old girl sustained grievous injuries in an incident of stray dog attack in Marchetahala village of the taluk on Saturday morning and is being treated at a local hospital.
The injured girl, Chaithra, was walking to a field near her house at around 9.30 am to answer natureâ€™s cal...]]>
item.author: Vartha Bharathi

item.title: Raichur: Police file case against Bank of Maharashtra manager for duping customers of Rs 10 crore
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur: Police file case against Bank of Maharashtra manager for duping customers of Rs 10 crore
Vartha Bharati | 29-03-2025 | 16:43:00 IST
K Narendra Reddy
Raichur: Cyber Crime Police have filed a case against K Narendra Reddy, the manager of the city branch of Bank of Maharashtra, under charge of duping customers of Rs 10 crore by using fake documents and sanctioning gold loans of the bank without their knowledge.
The police booked the case based on a complaint filed by Regional Manager...]]>
item.author: Vartha Bharathi
